sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A discourse vppon a question of the estate of this time. Faithfully translated out of French by E.A. Aggas, Edward.
[16] p.
Printed by Iohn Wolfe, and are to be solde at his shop ouer against the great South doore of Paules, London : 1591.
E.A. = Edward Aggas. A2r has caption: A question of this time. Why doth not the King become a Catholike?. Running title reads: A question of this time. Signatures: A-B⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
